website_summaries.verdict: This ionic hot brush comes with two ceramic barrels, is usable on all hair types, and has two heat settings. A simple and functional tool.
pros: Ionic technology to keep hair smooth as it dries
Different-size barrels depending on hair thickness and to create curls
cons: Reports of hair becoming tangled in the bristles

customer_reviews.title: Completely broken after 2nd use.
customer_reviews.text: Product defective, plastic parts inside the unit broke on second use. These plastic parts are part of the core unit, not fixable by replacing the brush head. I used the old model for over 5 years with no problem. This new one was money down the drain. Very dissapponting.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Love this hot brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have shoulder length fine hair on the thinner side. This makes drying it a breeze. I was worried the small brush would be to big but it is really just right. I towel dry prior to using and wait about 5 to 10 minutes then use it after adding my hair products. It drys my hair and gives a nice amount of light shape/body to it pretty quickly. The rotating brush is helpful and picks up my hair nicely. The multi-direction spin is nice depending on the style I am aiming for.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was debating getting this versus the babylis, but ultimately got this because it was cheaper. It’s pretty easy to use once you get the hang of it. It has two buttons so you can control the direction of rotation. I also have the instyler which is similar but is more of a heating tool rather than a dryer. I like this conair better than the instyler. I have a shoulder length bob and the 1.5 inch brush works well to get my hair to stay flipped in even when my hair naturally wants to flip outwards. Also, it makes my color treated hair look shiny and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut jelly and butter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with tempered expectations, but from my first use this is my all time favorite hair tool. I have never enjoyed drying or styling my hair, and I have never felt good about my lack of styling ability. Add to this 2 bad haircuts in a row and perhaps you can imagine how desperate I was: I actually contemplated shaving my head & wearing a wig. Since using the Hot Spin Brush I not only like this tool more with each use, but I no longer hate styling my hair. The spin is great for avoiding brush stuck in hair syndrome and for styling. I believe this is the best hair tool of all time.
customer_reviews.author: vptulsa

customer_reviews.title: drys and styles quickly with only one product!
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time I have purchased. The first time I got it from BBB. After many years the turn stopped working, however the air still worked. Hey at less than $50 can't expect it to last forever! This is the only place where the package has 2 easily removable brush heads. Very nice to have the choice as my hair goes from long to short. I like that the handle is a little shorter and the cord is also shorter. The protective covers are cheap plastic..not the harder plastic of original. I kept the cover from my old styler. This is great: drys and styles quickly with only one product!
customer_reviews.author: Tinker Belle

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I received it today and I had to try it. I actually re-washed my hair. I blew it dry--about half way and then used the Con Air and I LOVE what it did for my hair! Love Love! I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great hair in 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: In 10 minutes it looks like I got a professional blowout! My hair is wavy/curly when dry. It was dry but this smoothing of my locks normally takes at least half an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Circle takes the square

customer_reviews.title: Was so disappointed. This item is one of the most clumsiest ...
customer_reviews.text: Was so disappointed. This item is one of the most clumsiest hair items I have ever encountered. The wand part of the item is so big I could hardly get my hand around it. The brushes were way to big for my type of hair. So to use this item you better have a thick full head of hair that is long. I ended up giving It to my daughter and not sure she could even use it. Should have returned it. Another item from Amazon that did not fit the bill. Sorry Amazon, think you have to review your items a little more closely and give them a little more scrutiny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS! I do recommend this for people.
customer_reviews.text: Long storey short, many years ago I had a product similar to this and it worked perfect for my fine hair. I just received this yesterday, tried it this morning and LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it! It cut my hair time from 15 min. to 5 min. I know, some are thinking "yeah right". Like I said I have fine, thin hair and it is a AWESOME tool form me :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Crockett - Nehls

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding styling tool.
customer_reviews.text: It's become my go-to hair styling tool. The left/right buttons turn the brush in that direction and adjust according to the heat setting. They allow you to style with one hand. They don't work on the cool setting (as would be expected since the cool is used to set your style.) My hair is a middle length bob and it's great to be able to touch it up in the morning with this tool. I would definitely buy it again and would and have recommended it to others. It also does a great job straitening out bangs or adding a bit of volume to the root area.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and had a really tough time doing anything with my hair since only one hand/arm is working but not always in coordination with the other arm. This Spin Brush die a fantastic job giving my shoulder length hair body and big soft curls. I've only had it a week and hope that it won't break like some people have said because I just LOVE it. No more straight stiff hair, but super soft hair with optional large curls. I highly recommend it for people that also have upper body, hand/arm issues.
customer_reviews.author: A Catlover In Colorado

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Rotating Hot Air Styler Brush
customer_reviews.text: Styling your hair will be quicker if you use a blow dryer first to partially dry your hair. It takes too long to only use the rotating styler brush. I have only used the 2" attachment and it removes "frizzes" and smooths your hair with a slight curl on the ends. If you place your hair extending beyond the bristles width, your hair will get tangled. The 2" attachment does not give you a tight curl. The length of my hair is about 4-5" past my shoulders. This is the 2nd one I have owed after 5-ish years my 1st one was losing bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Murf

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!  Did not work as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine/thin blonde hair and this was a menace. One light press of the button to rotate the brush had my hair in huge knots. I tried and tried to get this product to work for me, hoping that it would give me volume and style. It didn't. Even with thicker or fuller hair, I still don't think this product would have worked as advertised. Just don't waste your money or your time.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Peterson

customer_reviews.title: That the brush worked perfectly and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: At first I had to master the buttons which I did quickly. I found no problem with using this and actually loved it. until my hair started coming out in patches.It didnt even occur to me that it could be my new styling brush, but this morning I used it and the brush was full of hair. I will not use it again until I make sure that it is not pulling my hair out. I am not saying that the brush pulled my hair out...just want to make that clear. But until I know different...I'm giving it a rest.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Yopp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work as well as the Revlon rotating dryer/styler. I could dry and style with it and it made the hair smooth. With the Conair I have to have the hair almost dry and the hair does not hold the style as well as with my previous hot air brush. I use products to protect from the heat, but still have some fly away, frizzy spots. Unfortunately the Revlon model I had is no longer available. I'm sure I can't return it now since I have used it. I hate to spend more money, but I will start looking for different brand of dryer/styler.
customer_reviews.author: SCGirl

customer_reviews.title: This product is a Godsend!
customer_reviews.text: I have never found a hair product that I have loved so much! My hair has always been horrible to style because of it being really wavy. I would always have to use a hair straightener to get it to look remotely okay. I had my hair cut above my shoulders/to my chin a couple weeks back, looked totally cute when the stylist did it, all she used was a brush and blow dryer. I could not replicate it! This product let's me do exactly what she did and more! My hair looks like I came right out of the salon. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED - NOT MUCH AIRFLOW, DOESN'T CURL!
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair and was hoping there would be enough airflow on the "HIGH" setting, but it was very unsatisfactory! I have short bangs and really wanted my bangs to turn out like the video showed but my bangs ended up with a slight curl that immediately went flat while I dried the rest of my hair. The ends of my hair were basically the same as my bangs. This airbrush tool is NOT for me as it only has 500 Watts (not included in the product info online)
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product - Does What It Says!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love ❤️ this product! Once you get the hang of the spin brush, you will have a professionally blown dried hairdo, that is shiny and sleek with no frizzy, fly away hairs! I personally have baby fine, color treated hair that doesn’t hold a curl for anything. But with this product, my looks gorgeous and the style remains all day long! It is truly a wonder product!! Buy it now, you won’t regret it... 😉♥️🙋🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: JPNapa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great product, just not for me. I have chin length straight fine gray hair. Even the 1 1/2" barrel is too big to curl my hair effectively. Another problem for me was the bristles caught my hair a little too well. It felt like it was being grabbed and then in addition the actual mechanics of handling the backwards and forward buttons was tricky for me. They are placed opposite each other on the handle and it's easy (at least for me) to accidentally hit the wrong one. I imagine this styler is great for someone with longer and thicker hair.
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: This brush would be great if it had a little more power and if ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush would be great if it had a little more power and if the bristles were a little more durable. I had high hopes for this brush after reading reviews, but my own experience with it was quite disappointing. The bristles would hardly even catch onto my hair unless I did EXTREMELY thin sections. They were too flimsy to really catch and do their job. And even on the high setting, the power is extremely low, which makes it take quite awhile to dry. Overall in my opinion a blow dryer and brush is an easier and better option. Do not recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Toal

customer_reviews.title: It's easy and it does not tangle my hair
customer_reviews.text: IF I had a complaint it would be the cord could use being a foot or two longer. I've always hated blow drying my hair. I never used to bother except for very special occassions. This thing is amazing! It is easy to use, even one handed. I was afraid of getting my hair caught in the rotating brush- never happened. The brush is so gentle my hair doesn't get caught in it, either. It picks up enough to dry it, but not so much that it causes a knot. I blow dry my hair all the time now! And I love the results.
customer_reviews.author: LeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Smoothed my sadistic hair
customer_reviews.text: I have angry, spiteful hair that is somewhere between 2B and 2C. It has broken a few brushes and occasionally forms dreads. This heated brush (with a small amount of anti-frizz product - I've tried several with similar results), helped smooth my hair into a brushable condition while dry, and helped prevent the usual tangles and small mammal capture that is typical of my hair between washes. Styling does take a bit of time, but it seems to be an amount of time consistent with other styling methods. My hair does "catch" fairly often, but reversing usually frees my hair painlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Dumah Roark

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife. When it arrived the box was rattling. Upon opening she noticed item loosely packed, fingerprints on the barrel and a hair in the 1 1/2” curl attachment. She was appalled and this is obviously being returnec.
customer_reviews.author: Atilla

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had quite a bit of difficulty using this spin brush. I have had 2 other brands before and this one has the shortest cord, which won't stay in the outlet (I've never run into that before). The control is a dial at the bottom of the handle that I've found impossible to use one-handed. My hair seems to always get stuck in the end of the barrel. This product had very high reviews and that is why I selected it, wish now that I had stayed with the previous brand I owned.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina G

customer_reviews.title: Great Stying for the Less Than Coordinated
customer_reviews.text: Finally a hair grooming product I can be successful with. Never been very good at handling a heavy hair dryer in one hand and a roll brush in the other. Now I can style my hair with ease and it also makes my hair shiny. I have medium short length hair and use the 1 1/2 inch roller brush. I'm very pleased with this Infinity Pro by Conair.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Still undecided on a 3-5 star rating until further
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to Post a full review yet as I’ve only used 3 times I will update later First thoughts on it is it truly styles my hair nicely But I do notice the spinning action does not airways work on the under action It’s great so far on feathering my sides and top in a over curl though Will let you know soon my overall thoughts
customer_reviews.author: Dillygirl

customer_reviews.title: My second one and had shipped to my daughters so I can use it there!
customer_reviews.text: Did not want to pack it up when I traveled to see my daughter so I shipped one there since I cant live with out it. When I got my first one it did take a bit of time to use it. I had to take it kinda slow but now I am like a beautician would be with it. I have been using my first one for over a year, maybe longer. I have should length hair with lots of layers. I use CHI Volumn booster on the top of my hair, give nice volume. Also I do not have my hair shower wet when I use CONAIR
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: USED ITEM NASTY
customer_reviews.text: NASTY, it was used. the brush was covered in someone elses hair. i'm so grossed out. the box was all slashed up and the contents inside were just stuffed in and closed. i'm so grossed out. returning it and will never buy from this seller again. NAST NASTY NASTY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Mack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I only used this dryer 2 or 3 times because the dryer power is not high enough to adequately dry my thick, curly hair. It made my hair frizzy, and I would need to finish off my hair by completely straightening it. Not worth my time. Also the rotating motor is way too strong. I would have to rotate it the other way to untangle my hair from the brush. I would not recommend. Unfortunately, it already past my return window so I can’t even get my money back on this. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to remember which way the brush spins when you hold which button on which side of your head. It's too cumbersome. When you spin the brush the wrong way it pulls and tangles up your hair. Plus you have to hold the button down while spinning. It shouldn't be that hard but it was for me. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: BookFiend

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend This
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I have really bad fibromyalgia & because of that I have had difficulty drying my hair using a blow dryer & a plain old brush. I found my first Infinity Pro at Walgreens & purchased it. It solved all my problems. It dried my hair while at the same time styled it. It is easy to maneuver & doesn't tire out my arms. When my first one finally gave out I found it on Amazon & purchased it. I highly recommend this dryer/styler.
customer_reviews.author: Snowball1999

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous for long hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is dangerous for long hair. The motor is so strong doing my hair myself my hair kept getting caught. It has a release but it was a pain to use. I use it as a regular round brush dryer. I do not use the rotator at all. Conair makes high quality products but this design seems off.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea, but it just didn't work well for me. The cons that turned me off are... The on/off dial at the bottom makes it hard to switch it off with one hand. The rotating buttons are very easy to push, sometime by mistake. I don't feel that it blows enough hot air to dry effectively. The bristles are very soft and leaves my hair too frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: My last Conair spinbrush lasted me about 5 years, and just fell apart last week. I went to Target to buy a new one where they are usually $60. Target no longer carried any brushes that spin, so I got on here. It is wonderful! Just like my old one. Thank YOU!!!! The user's guide suggests drying hair and then using this on barely damp hair, however I go vice versa and use it as my primary dryer. I love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylen Kichline

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I'm growing out a pixie cut... my hair is naturally curly/wavey so it's at the point where I need to start styling it every day again. This is just what I needed to get a polished looked with minimal effort. Because my hair is still pretty short in some places it's difficult to get the exact look I want, but for the length my hair is now, it does what I need it to do. I'm excited to continue using it as my hair gets longer!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Allen

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: bought for my friends birthday... just asked her how it worked 👎 she said the bristles syaryed to fall out while she used it... too late to return ☹
customer_reviews.author: v. soto

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing - small explosion while using it on day 3
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of a Conair hot air spin brush. This last purchase (new model) was a dissapointment, first because it was dificult to change from low, high and cool air, I had to use both hands when with the old model I could control it with just one hand, but what made me discard it was that on the third use, while I was styling my hair I heard a small explosion like sound just next to my ear and a burnt smell. I immediatly stopped using it and went back to my regular hair dryer. This is either a faulty design or factory defect. Will think twice before buying another one from Conair.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product isn’t strong enough to be worth it. I cannot sit there and dry my hair from start to finish. It would take forever with this product. It was only good for touch ups when my hair was already dry and in that case wasn’t worth it to me. You do get used to using the buttons though. Please note I have thin hair so if it isn’t suitable for me it would be even worse for thick hair. Also the bristles easily get bent out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: Blips

customer_reviews.title: the spinning can be hard to control and ultimately pulls ...
customer_reviews.text: the spinning can be hard to control and ultimately pulls on my hair a bit too much for my liking. does not always dry hair smoothly...most of the time my naturally medium wave hair will start misbehaving after a few hours. i suspect this is because the vents in the barrel are too large and thus hair is being blow-dried but not as styled as other similar round drying brushes that have smaller vents.
customer_reviews.author: jen k

customer_reviews.title: Salon-worthy hair!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try one of these spin-brushes to see if it would really give me that blow-out look from the salon. With a little volumizer mousse and this on damp hair, it was exactly what I was looking for. You will be amazed at not only how it gives you that blow-out look but also how incredibly easy it is to use. Every woman needs one of these! Don't hesitate, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It’s my 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s my 2nd one. Old one bought 7 years ago, still works to dry, but finally stopped rotating. Recommend keeping bristles free of strands after each use or next time they won’t grip hair as well to dry, and also to keep from slowing down the rotating power. Mine is Super thick hair. Just wish it had stronger wattage to quicken dry time. Gives great body and shine.
customer_reviews.author: Iitia

customer_reviews.title: Bad Review
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item, when arrived I tried it for less than 5 minuet, then suddenly it shuts down and never worked again!!! The temperature got so high that the bristles on the brush melted to it!! I waited for it to cool down as written on it , then tried to turn it on again but it’s never worked ever since
customer_reviews.author: mahmoud

customer_reviews.title: Hair loves it....Hands not so much
customer_reviews.text: My hair looks great when using this brush. No flyaways, full volume. I appreciate that it's not too noisy. It is, however, not comfortable to use unless you have very long fingers. My hands actually ache from using it, and I'm developing a new callous on my thumb. I find I need to return to the blow dryer and round brush a couple times a week just to give my hands a break. Two changes would help to make this air brush worthy of a five-star review: spin controls that are closer to the narrow part of the handle and a longer cord. Not everyone has an outlet right in front of the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 40 days
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on June 12th, stopped working on July 20th. That is less than 40 days of super light use, maybe once a week, if that. There doesn't seem to be a guaranty to fix it and past the 30 days return window. Obviously, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LuvsAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a good hair styling product. The brush is too soft and doesn’t grip the hair. The blower isn’t very strong. You have to pre dry your hair with a regular dryer then try to use this product. Not happy with it at all. UNFORTUNATELY A BIG Waste of $40. Tried to return it but missed the deadline by one day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! A little heavy but much easier than holding a blow dryer and a brush. The bristles turn both ways which can get confusing once you’re curling. You feel like it’s gonna tangle your hair but it’s smooth. I have a bob cut so it’s perfect for short hair. I only used it once. I mostly blow dried my hair then used it once it was mostly dry so it didn’t yank my hair. I plan to use it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Markitto

customer_reviews.title: Not a dryer,  just a medium hot brush.
customer_reviews.text: The brush bristles have no grasp on hair also the rotating function tangles and brakes the hair. It does not heat enough to style your hair. As a hair polisher for already dried and set hair is ok, but it wont work to actually do your hair, it comes out frizzy and tangled. I have many years of experience with similar products from the same brand, I love Conair and I would still reccomend it, just not this particular product, it does not work well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me good enough. It was not hot enough to dry ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me good enough. It was not hot enough to dry my hair. The spinning feature is probably good for short hair, but mine got tangled and pulled. I replace it with Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer & Volumizer oval brush that does wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: yee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drying and styling tool!
customer_reviews.text: I like this hair dryer / styler more than any other dryer and brush combo I have ever used. This is the 2nd one I have owned. The 1st lasted several years until recently. My hair is thin and shoulder length. The InfinityPro makes drying and styling easier. It adds great volume too! I would purchase it again and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AZmom

customer_reviews.title: Spin Brush
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is just my thin, baby-fine hair. I thought this was the answer to adding body and height to my hair. I have a chin length bob and the brushes are just too large for my hairstyle and the body that I would like to achieve. It actually makes my hair flatter. My fault, I asked for this as a gift and appreciate that I got what I asked for. Maybe it would be much better for someone with long hair as shown on the box
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Finallllllllly!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I’m not mad at my stylist for wanting to blow dry my hair, BECAUSE I CAN GO HOME AND RECREATE what she did!!! Make sure you SECTION YOUR HAIR AND THAT IT IS 80% dry!!! Works like a charm!! Amazing product! Haven’t used a straightener since!!! Ohhhh AND KEEP COVERS ON THE HEADS!!! It Keeps bristles from smooshing!!!
customer_reviews.author: LuLLLaBeLLLe

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed by this product. It has stopped spinning , this just after one month of service!!! Does an excellent job of curling hair but the lifespan is obviously very compromised having packed up after a month.... Although I received the replacement (timeously) of the first one I bought from Amazon which had packed up after a few weeks of use , I experienced the same problem, the new one turned out to have an equally short life span! what a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Rahiman

customer_reviews.title: Long, thick, straight, fine hair review.
customer_reviews.text: I have very long, straight, thick, fine hair. While I do like this, I think the bristles are a little too soft. It is a somewhat difficult to get it to grip my hair. This is new to me so it very well may be my poor technique. The handle is somewhat large, and I think it would be easier to master this with a more manageable sized handle. I do love that it spins both forward and backward as this is important should your hair start to tangle. This is also my first time using an ionic hair dryer, and there is a definite difference in the smoothness and texture of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Raemey

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. You will not be disappointed. Your hair must be almost dry for you to not have to spend a long time drying. It is a style tool not a conventional hair dryer. Do not care for the twist handle setting as the last click is the cool setting and brush will not spin on that setting. Over all my hair has a salon look everyday and my hair looks absolutely fantastic. Yes it is pricey but I'm sure as we all have spend money on products that did not work and are in a drawer. This one you will use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so I would not recommend for fully drying hair but perfect for styling short ...
customer_reviews.text: It did what I needed to do to style my LOB haircut. Not very strong, so I would not recommend for fully drying hair but perfect for styling short hair that is difficult to do with a roller brush and blow dryer. Just remember to start from the root and work your way down or you will tangle your hair up into the bristles, which is very unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Gabeh Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Too big and clunky
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product, but it it very big and clunky. The handle is very thick, I have average hands and was not able to easily push the rotator buttons. The switch at the bottom of the handle is almost impossible to read, and can’t quickly be changed while continuing to style your hair. Returning the product and will continue to use my Revlon non-rotating hot air brush.
customer_reviews.author: Anja K

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED ROTATING SECOND TIME OF USE!!! Don’t buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give negative stars if I could. I bought this hot brush as a present for my mom. She really wanted one after she saw one of her friends using. We looked on amazon and bought this one for the good reviews. She used it once, that time all worked well. And she loves the result. The very next time she tried it, the brush had stopped rotating. Which defeats completely the purpose of having such a hair tool. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karine Theodoro

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hair appliance. I blow dry my hair about 3/4 of the way dry then use this to finish. It gives me LOADS of body and makes short work of styling my hair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dement

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these in the past until eventually it gave up. Ordered a different brand but returned it because it was too big around and therefore unwieldy to hold (I had to use 2 hands). Returned it and ordered this brand again and it's working great. I only use the smaller of the 2 brush attachments but someone with longer hair would probably benefit from the option of the using the bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Biggest waste of money , if you want your hair pulled out by all means buy it. I tried and tried to figure out how to use it without ripping my hair out and just couldn't figure it out. I let my much younger daughter use it thinking it was a young person's thing but she couldn't figure out how to use it safely either without doing some damage to her hair. A hair styler shouldn't be this hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Who changed the on setting?
customer_reviews.text: What brilliant product engineer thought it was a good idea to change the on/high/low/off settings? It now requires two hands. I'd bet money that a guy with short hair thought this was a good idea. Other than that I like the product...it's my second one, but I have to admit that I'll look a great deal closer at all "updated" design elements should I consider purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Von Dornburg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice unit!
customer_reviews.text: I would love if there was a way to hold on to the far end of the unit while drying. Also, I wish there was a hard bristle brush with it as the soft one doesn’t grab my hair like I’d like. However, I use it daily and like it a lot better than curling brushes (that don’t rotate) that I’ve used before. The rotating makes a huge difference though sometimes it grabs hair and spins it into dreadlocks. Overall, I do like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality only last for a short time!!!
customer_reviews.text: i just have it for less than 3 months, now it smell burned and stop working. Pls dont waste your money...search for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Lilis

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: It's been more than a month since I purchased this, and I have really tried to like this product, as I was very excited when I bought it. I tried it on partially dried hair, damp hair, hair with styling product, and no matter what, it did a horrible job with styling! It helped dry my hair, but did nothing for styling - it didn't help straighten or make my hair look presentable! Instead it made my hair look like one giant static ball! My hair was huge after and very dried out, even if I used product in my hair! I really wish I could return it, but I've already used it!
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours trying to drying my hair with this product. To a point that my hand began to cramp and it just became uncomfortable. Unfortunately, this product doesn't work for me. The drying process takes too long when I sectioned my hair to small pieces. My hair never dried fully. I'm not sure if it's due to the fact that I have alot of hair on my head but this was a very difficult and disappointing experience. Maybe it'll work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Martinez

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to get used to using this with the different features. And many experiments with technique. But I love it!!! I will never use a flat iron or regular blow dryer again!!! It dries and styles in one motion, takes no time at all and I have long hair way past my shoulders. It makes my hair shine and it holds the curls and waves till the next shampoo, very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Cleo Headley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I have baby fine hair. Gives great volume and dries my hair quickly; again I have super thin hair so it doesn't take long to begin with. Even my 16 year old son thought that I had done something differently to my hair and said that it looked really good. All I did was dry it with this spin brush hair dryer with no hair products.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: This product was ok for someone with not a lot of hair. It doesn’t grab and it doesn’t flatten. Hair is still fluffy afterwards. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save Time - look great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is life altering. No more killing my wrist spinning a brush while holding the hair dryer in the opposite. It saves time and works great. I have layered hair, below my shoulders and tend to use the smaller brush for a little more curve, not curls. I do use a heat protective spray to make sure I'm not damaging my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Drying power is strong.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it is light weight. Drying time is very fast. It’s extremely powerful. The only down fall is that you have to Stop and look at the dial to turn on and off or change drying power. My old dryer can be changed with one hand Making it very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: The brush on this was so soft it wouldn’t go through even my fine medium-weight hair. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: patricia z. choo

customer_reviews.title: This pulled my wife's hair!
customer_reviews.text: She loved the wonderful result and fast process but when cleaning the brush, her hair was coming out in handfulls!!! She thought that maybe it was due to the automatic rotation... Now she is opting to one that she can spin herself and have better control.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I owned a different model hot air brush years ago that worked wonders and I loved it but it broke down. Since then I have been searching for a replacement with no luck of finding a good match. The original one I owned is not made anymore. I bought this one hoping that it would work but nope same problem. My problem is that the brush pulls on my hair when I put it at the roots. The bristles are too soft I guess and the hair just gets wrapped around the barrell. Unfortunately I have to say that this product is just plain horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jmlk

customer_reviews.title: Bristles Too Soft
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but the bristles on the brush are entirely too soft. I have naturally curly blonde hair, this means it's pretty thin. I can't wrap the hair around it and let it spin because the bristles are so soft they just bend under the hair and it doesn't move. I wish I hadn't waited so long to try to return it. It doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Debra O

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line, didn't dry long hair
customer_reviews.text: I've got long hair. I bought this to replace an old hot air brush. It just didn't have the volume of air needed to dry my hair in a reasonable time. It was big & bulky,making it very hard to hold. The. spinning part was awkward. The right left spin buttons seemed on the wrong sides making it more awkward to use. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariekan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this item
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this hair dryer brush combo - It works great. I don't need to curl my hair anymore; I just use this product. With arthritis it really help me from having to continually turn a brush. Good job Conair!
customer_reviews.author: Merissa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Bought this to replace an old Conair 600/1000 watt hairdryer with a brush that was perfect. This one is only 500 watts and takes forever to dry. The 1-1/2” brush is more like 2-1/2” and is way too big for my short hair. Am buying another hairdryer because this one doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gilded Lily

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my previous Conair Spin Air Rotating Brush that stopped spinning. What I really like is that this one comes with an additional barrel that is easily interchangeable and I use. I wish they kept the purple "cover" that you would normally get from the ones that are available at drugstore retailers. Also wish there was a way to get my other one fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Very curly hair...perfect tool that makes me feel beautiful every time I use it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Makes my hair full and a great lift! I originally bought it when I had a neck issue and couldn't use a brush and hair dryer together and I never went back. I don't even need to use a straightener unless I want a sleek look. I have extremely curly hair and it does a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Breeding

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this and loved it but it died after 4 years of used. I bought this one as a replacement and find the motor to be too weak. I have less than shoulder length layered hair and it bogs down and won't spin.......plus I just noticed a disclaimer in the product description that says this product can cause cancer and birth defects......what? Going back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a regular user of spin brushes. This is a good product, normal speed and heat, nothing extreme. I like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Jainde

customer_reviews.title: they larger barrel sucks and gets stuck while spinning
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work as well as their first model. I thought I was getting a steal because it's about 20 dollars cheaper than the original that only has one size barrel...nope...they larger barrel sucks and gets stuck while spinning.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jewels

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter for Christmas. She has very thick, long hair that takes forever to dry. She told me it took her only about 1/2hr to dry and style her hair with this brush. Knowing how much time it usually takes her to dry her hair, this is quite a testimonial to the quality of this brush/styler.
customer_reviews.author: tomsgram

customer_reviews.title: Takes care of covid hair
customer_reviews.text: I was feeling dowdy since covid was preventing trips to the hairdresser. I tried this and lived it. It adds shine and curl. More of a wave and lots of body. There is a learning curve so watch YouTube or study the manual. One you get it down, you will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, short cord, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 5 star if the cord was longer, love the styling leaves the hair with a salon look every time, hair must be 80% at t dry before using, love the 2 size brushes on my short bob, again the cord is too short if your electrical outlet is not located by your hip height.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I love my new hair dryer. I use it after I use a regular hair dryer though. Once I blow dry my hair, I use this brush for styling. It took me a bit of time to get used to using it, even though I had similar hair dryer, except it didn't spin. I love the idea that I can remove the brush and wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Natuka

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick hair
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok for someone that has little hair. Little hair that is not thick at all. My hair is not as long anymore, but very thick and there is a lot lot of it. Didn’t work for me and it took me a loooong time to try and finish the whole head.
customer_reviews.author: Miki T

customer_reviews.title: not what you think...
customer_reviews.text: I have long, fine hair...this can really pull your hair if you aren't careful. Only really works on the 'high' setting. I think if you have fine to medium short hair you might like this better. I like my blowdryer and brush better than this. Oh well..
customer_reviews.author: Helena Lutz

customer_reviews.title: not exactly what I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great idea, but it does not dry the hair much at all. Turns out, I had to use my regular blow dryer to get my hair almost dry before using it for the curling feature - which causes the hair to tangle if you accidentally turn the switch the wrong way. It sits in a drawer...unused
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & I love the result!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product - I have used this item for about the past 10 years almost every day. It dries & softly curls hair at the same time. this is my 3rd one. (I bought the first 2 at Walmart and bought the 3rd one here).
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: My professional opinion.
customer_reviews.text: I just cant get by without this tool. I've been a professional stylist for many many years and I tell everyone about this tool. Your hair is completely curled and finished by the time your hair is dried. As well as, it never leaves your hair frizzy or dried out looking, but it leaves your hair shiny and glowing (in a good way haha)!!! I have actually had people come up to me and ask me if they could touch my hair! Truly, if you have one tool you cant do without, it's this one..... a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Great For My Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush blow dryer. It smooths out my hair, gives it body and is easy to use. I have owned one that didn't have the interchangeable sizes and am happy that I found this to replace the older one. My hair is very thick so I do start off using a regular blow dryer on my roots or I would be here all day! I absolutely recommend this. Great product. And I have owned my fair share of different types of curling irons/flat irons/blow dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Money
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, coarse, naturally curly hair and this thing tore it up, no matter how much heat styling product I applied to my hair first. I just trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: This definitely was better than I was expecting... my only ~minor~disappointment was the strength of the roller... it’s a little slower than I’m used to but I’m happy I bought it ... definitely worth trying if you’re on the fence .
customer_reviews.author: MarriedMomOf3+GSD

customer_reviews.title: I love it. but have to be careful with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it.but have to be careful with the way you spin it or will get caught up in Hair. Once I got use to the right rotations,was happy I bought it. It’s so much easier then holding brush and blow dryer. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene rudd

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this curler/dryer. It's easy to use. I have long hair passed my bra and had no problems using it. If you watch the video of the lady using the product it'll give you an idea of how to use it yourself. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Bristles are way too soft
customer_reviews.text: This is my third rotating air brush but my first Infiniti. It's by far my least favorite of the three. It is constantly getting caught in my hair because the bristles are way too soft. The other two air brushes I've used were great in the respect but they were cheap and didn't last too long and are no longer available. With this one, I have to be so careful to avoid getting my hair caught that it takes me twice as long as to dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: nomdenet

customer_reviews.title: Love it but.....
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use it for 10 minutes before I it started smoking. But I do like it and will reorder another one if they ever pick this one up. Shhould of been here yesterday to pick up. No show.
customer_reviews.author: sisnphx

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Does not really suit me for the length of hair I have (on the shorter side). Not very powerful really, and is hard to hold because it has a thick handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: First time using bristles were falling out, the brush kept slowing down, overall result was frizzy and it took too long to dry. I had this same model before and loved it years ago, before it made my hair smooth shiny and healthy looking. Not sure if it was just one that was poorly made or if they are manufactured differently now, perhaps the heat is less but very disappointed never the less.
customer_reviews.author: Rbwindowdesigns

product_meta.title: INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR Hot Air Spin Brush, 2 Inch and 1 1/2 Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Size:ComboAll you need is one tool to dry and style, get the perfect salon blowout at home! The INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR Hot Air Spin Brush is just what you need to create amazing curl, body and volume on damp or dry hair. With two brush sizes to choose from—2-inch to create voluminous curls and full body or 1 1/2-inch to create smaller natural curls and waves—this hot air curling brush puts you in control of your style. The true ion generator of the hot air brush releases up to 100 times more concentrated ions to protect hair from damage and its tourmaline ceramic technology creates shine as you dry, delivering silky smooth results every time. This hot air brush can be used on damp hair to style and dry at the same time, and is also great for refreshing hair or changing looks between shampoos. You get to choose! The multidirectional brushes of this Conair curling brush rotate in both directions but can also be used without the spin feature to give you another level of control. Tangle-free antistatic boar and nylon bristles work in conjunction with 2 heat settings and cool setting for all hair types and lengths. The new and improved slim handle of this hot air spin brush offers easy handling and superior spin function for polishing and setting styles. Also included are 2 protective covers to keep your spin brush attachments as good as new. With the INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR Hot Air Spin Brush, you’ll never need a separate brush and blow dryer again.
feature_bullets: 2-inch spin air brush creates voluminous curls for full body & 1 1/2- inch spin air brush creates small natural curls and waves. It also shines as you dry with ceramic technology that safely dries and promotes healthy hair; great for refreshing hair between shampoos

2 tourmaline ceramic spin air brush attachments safely dry hair and allow for curl customization; True ion generator releases up to 100x more concentrated ions to protect hair from damage, for silky smooth results and gorgeous shine
Hot Air Spin Brush rotates in both directions to volumes and shine. Use with or without spin function; Note - if the customer has the unit on “cool setting” the item will NOT spin or get hot
Tangle-free antistatic bristles, 2 heat settings and cool setting for all hair types; bonus protective brush cover included

Removable filter allows easy lint cleanup and extends motor life. Kindly check the user manual for troubleshooting steps. Conair products are insulated using mica, a naturally occurring mineral with outstanding thermal properties

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
